sn12.4:4.2: “vipassissa, bhikkhave, bhagavato arahato sammāsambuddhassa pubbeva sambodhā anabhisambuddhassa bodhisattasseva sato etadahosi:
sn12.4:4.3: ‘*kicchaṃ vatāyaṃ loko āpanno jāyati ca jīyati ca mīyati ca cavati ca upapajjati ca.
sn12.4:4.4: Atha ca panimassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ nappajānāti jarāmaraṇassa.
sn12.4:4.5: Kudāssu nāma imassa dukkhassa nissaraṇaṃ paññāyissati jarāmaraṇassā’ti?
sn12.4:5.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:5.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, kiṃpaccayā jarāmaraṇan’ti?
sn12.4:5.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:5.4: ‘jātiyā kho sati jarāmaraṇaṃ hoti, jātipaccayā jarāmaraṇan’ti.
sn12.4:6.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:6.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati jāti hoti, kiṃpaccayā jātī’ti?
sn12.4:6.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:6.4: ‘bhave kho sati jāti hoti, bhavapaccayā jātī’ti.
sn12.4:7.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:7.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati bhavo hoti, kiṃpaccayā bhavo’ti?
sn12.4:7.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:7.4: ‘upādāne kho sati bhavo hoti, upādānapaccayā bhavo’ti.
sn12.4:8.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:8.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati upādānaṃ hoti, kiṃpaccayā upādānan’ti?
sn12.4:8.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:8.4: ‘taṇhāya kho sati upādānaṃ hoti, taṇhāpaccayā upādānan’ti.
sn12.4:9.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:9.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati taṇhā hoti, kiṃpaccayā taṇhā’ti?
sn12.4:9.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:9.4: ‘vedanāya kho sati taṇhā hoti, vedanāpaccayā taṇhā’ti.
sn12.4:10.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:10.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati vedanā hoti, kiṃpaccayā vedanā’ti?
sn12.4:10.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:10.4: ‘phasse kho sati vedanā hoti, phassapaccayā vedanā’ti.
sn12.4:11.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:11.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati phasso hoti, kiṃpaccayā phasso’ti?
sn12.4:11.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:11.4: ‘saḷāyatane kho sati phasso hoti, saḷāyatanapaccayā phasso’ti.
sn12.4:12.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:12.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati saḷāyatanaṃ hoti, kiṃpaccayā saḷāyatanan’ti?
sn12.4:12.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:12.4: ‘nāmarūpe kho sati saḷāyatanaṃ hoti, nāmarūpapaccayā saḷāyatanan’ti.
sn12.4:13.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:13.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati nāmarūpaṃ hoti, kiṃpaccayā nāmarūpan’ti?
sn12.4:13.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:13.4: ‘viññāṇe kho sati nāmarūpaṃ hoti, viññāṇapaccayā nāmarūpan’ti.
sn12.4:14.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:14.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati viññāṇaṃ hoti, kiṃpaccayā viññāṇan’ti?
sn12.4:14.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:14.4: ‘saṅkhāresu kho sati viññāṇaṃ hoti, saṅkhārapaccayā viññāṇan’ti.
sn12.4:15.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:15.2: ‘kimhi nu kho sati saṅkhārā honti, kiṃpaccayā saṅkhārā’ti?
sn12.4:15.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:15.4: ‘avijjāya kho sati saṅkhārā honti, avijjāpaccayā saṅkhārā’ti.
sn12.4:16.4: ‘Samudayo, samudayo’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādi.
sn12.4:17.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:17.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti, kissa nirodhā jarāmaraṇanirodho’ti?
sn12.4:17.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:17.4: ‘jātiyā kho asati jarāmaraṇaṃ na hoti, jātinirodhā jarāmaraṇanirodho’ti.
sn12.4:18.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:18.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati jāti na hoti, kissa nirodhā jātinirodho’ti?
sn12.4:18.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:18.4: ‘bhave kho asati jāti na hoti, bhavanirodhā jātinirodho’ti.
sn12.4:19.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:19.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati bhavo na hoti, kissa nirodhā bhavanirodho’ti?
sn12.4:19.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:19.4: ‘upādāne kho asati bhavo na hoti, upādānanirodhā bhavanirodho’ti.
sn12.4:20.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:20.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati upādānaṃ na hoti, kissa nirodhā upādānanirodho’ti?
sn12.4:20.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:20.4: ‘taṇhāya kho asati upādānaṃ na hoti, taṇhānirodhā upādānanirodho’ti.
sn12.4:21.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:21.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati taṇhā na hoti, kissa nirodhā taṇhānirodho’ti?
sn12.4:21.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:21.4: ‘vedanāya kho asati taṇhā na hoti, vedanānirodhā taṇhānirodho’ti.
sn12.4:22.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:22.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati vedanā na hoti, kissa nirodhā vedanānirodho’ti?
sn12.4:22.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:22.4: ‘phasse kho asati vedanā na hoti, phassanirodhā vedanānirodho’ti.
sn12.4:23.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:23.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati phasso na hoti, kissa nirodhā phassanirodho’ti?
sn12.4:23.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:23.4: ‘saḷāyatane kho asati phasso na hoti, saḷāyatananirodhā phassanirodho’ti.
sn12.4:24.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:24.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati saḷāyatanaṃ na hoti, kissa nirodhā saḷāyatananirodho’ti?
sn12.4:24.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:24.4: ‘nāmarūpe kho asati saḷāyatanaṃ na hoti, nāmarūpanirodhā saḷāyatananirodho’ti.
sn12.4:25.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:25.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati nāmarūpaṃ na hoti, kissa nirodhā nāmarūpanirodho’ti?
sn12.4:25.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:25.4: ‘viññāṇe kho asati nāmarūpaṃ na hoti, viññāṇanirodhā nāmarūpanirodho’ti.
sn12.4:26.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:26.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati viññāṇaṃ na hoti, kissa nirodhā viññāṇanirodho’ti?
sn12.4:26.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:26.4: ‘saṅkhāresu kho asati viññāṇaṃ na hoti, saṅkhāranirodhā viññāṇanirodho’ti.
sn12.4:27.1: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa etadahosi:
sn12.4:27.2: ‘kimhi nu kho asati saṅkhārā na honti, kissa nirodhā saṅkhāranirodho’ti?
sn12.4:27.3: Atha kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa yoniso manasikārā ahu paññāya abhisamayo:
sn12.4:27.4: ‘avijjāya kho asati saṅkhārā na honti, avijjānirodhā saṅkhāranirodho’ti.
sn12.4:28.4: ‘Nirodho, nirodho’ti kho, bhikkhave, vipassissa bodhisattassa pubbe ananussutesu dhammesu cakkhuṃ udapādi, ñāṇaṃ udapādi, paññā udapādi, vijjā udapādi, āloko udapādī”ti.
